Author: The Rentals Token
Title: The Rentals Token Decentralized home sharing network in blockchain
Body: https://i.imgur.com/u6YHcol.png  The Rentals Network is an entire ecosystem which includes a token, a set of protocols and a DApp to provide a decentralized vacation rentals marketplace. It uses blockchain technology to solve the challenges and inefficiencies of the home sharing and vacations rentals market. The Rentals Token (TRT) smart token enables an open marketplace to publish, distribute and book vacation properties, while enforcing the rules set by an owner, property manager or channel manager. It allows for a significantly more efficient and secure property rentals supply chain for all the players in the market, from the owner to the guest. LaComunity is in a key position to enable and promote the decentralization of the vacation rentals and home sharing market.  https://i.imgur.com/M1YwHKH.gif  The Rentals Marketplace Protocols  • Agnostic and open to any player in the market to publish, distribute and book vacational properties. • A set of Ethereum smart contracts. • Generic and standard business rules. Flexible and adaptable. • Aligning incentives for all parties. • Enables parties to publish their rentals through a sophisticated and decentralized supply chain, without losing control and whilst fully keeping track of the entire process with a period • Enables the creation of a new layer of third party DApps built on top of them.  The Market Disruption: Blockchain technology to solve the challenges and inefficiencies of the rentals market. Much more efficient, with a secure vacation rentals supply chain for all the players in the market: owners, property managers, channel managers, sales channels and guests.  The TRT smart token enables an open marketplace to publish, distribute and book vacation properties.  The Rentals DApp The Rentals DApp is a user interface on top of the Ethereum smart contracts of The Rentals Marketplace. The Rentals DApp is an easy and secure way to access The Rentals Marketplace and participate in the protocols. It allows for searching, publishing and booking with 0% fees for guests.  https://i.imgur.com/zwFBerE.png  Token Sale: Important ICO Information  https://www.rentalstoken.io/en/home#tokenSale  TOTAL SUPPLY: 1,350 million TRT ETH/TRT RATE: 1ETH = 7,500 TRT TARGET 1ST TIER PUBLIC SALE: 5M € TARGET 2ND TIER PUBLIC SALE: 20M €  International token sale dates   • Whitelist: Until September 16 • Pre-Sale: from September 17 to September 30 (45% discount) • 1st tier: October 1-October 31 (20% discount) • 2n tier: November 2-November 30 (No discount)  Smart contracts external audit: https://www.iosiro.com/trt-crowdsale-audit   Meet the Team  https://www.rentalstoken.io/en/home#team  Roadmap of The Rentals Token  https://www.rentalstoken.io/en/home#roadmap  Interested in purchasing TRT?
